title: Diving into Mi Cocina with Rick Martinez
description:
Referenced in this episode 

  • Mi Cocina: Cookbook
  • Sweet Heat: Rick's Video Series

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit

  • Borderline Salty: Rick's Podcast with Carla Lalli Music

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.

Theme Music by The Cabinetmaker on Blue Dot Sessions
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Rick Martinez)

itunes:title: Diving into Mi Cocina with Rick Martinez
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Rick Martinez
itunes:summary: This week on the podcast we are joined by host of Borderline Salty, Food52's Sweet Heat, and best-selling author of the new cookbook Mi Cocina. He tells us all about the incredible travels he had during the pandemic that laid the foundation for his book, as well as giving us details on his voracious sweet tooth and his simply genius cafe de olla recipe.
itunes:subtitle: This week on the podcast we are joined by host of Borderline Salty, Food52's Sweet Heat, and best-selling author of the new cookbook Mi Cocina. He tells us all about the incredible travels he had during the pandemic that laid the foundation for his book, as well as giving us details on his voracious sweet tooth and his simply genius cafe de olla recipe.
